name: ai.ludo/game-assets
title: Ludo AI Game Assets
description: Generate game assets using AI: sprites, icons, backgrounds, 3D models (GLB), animated spritesheets, videos, sound effects, music, and character voices. Supports multiple art styles including pixel art, low poly, and stylized 3D.

headers.name: Authorization
headers.description: API key from Ludo AI (format: 'ApiKey your-api-key'). Get your key at https://app.ludo.ai

examples.name: Generate Pixel Art Sprite
examples.description: Create a character sprite with specific art style
examples.note: createImage with image_type='sprite', art_style='Pixel Art (16-Bit)', perspective='Side-Scroll'

examples.name: Create Isometric Game Icon
examples.description: Generate an app icon for your game

examples.name: Convert Sprite to 3D Model
examples.description: Transform a 2D sprite into a 3D GLB model with PBR textures
examples.note: create3DModel with texture_type='pbr' returns model_url (.glb) and 4 snapshot images

examples.name: Create Walking Animation
examples.description: Animate a character with a walk cycle
examples.note: animateSprite with motion_prompt='walking cycle', loop=true, frames=16

examples.name: Generate Attack VFX
examples.note: animateSprite with image_type='sprite-vfx', motion_prompt='fire explosion effect'

examples.name: Create Game Trailer Clip
examples.description: Generate a short video from a screenshot
examples.note: createVideo with duration=5, prompt='camera slowly zooms in'

examples.name: Generate Laser Sound
examples.description: Create a sci-fi weapon sound effect
examples.note: createSoundEffect with description='futuristic laser gun firing, sci-fi'

examples.name: Create Battle Music
examples.note: createMusic with description='epic orchestral battle theme, fast-paced, intense'

examples.name: Generate Character Voice
examples.description: Create a unique voice for a game character
examples.note: createVoice with voice_description='gruff old warrior', text='Prepare for battle!'

notes: Credit-based pricing: images (0.5), 3D models (3), animations (5), videos (5-15), audio (3)
Supports multiple art styles: Pixel Art, Low Poly, Cartoonish, Stylized 3D, and more
3D models output as GLB with optional PBR textures
Spritesheets support variable frame counts (4-64) and sizes (64-256px)
Long-running operations (3D models, animations) may take 60-120 seconds
